subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[adhere]]; to [[stick]]
# to [[rely]] on; to [[depend]] on
# to [[add]]; to [[attach]]; to [[enclose]]
# to [[get]] [[close]]

subSections.title: Compounds

subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=c|rs=阜05}} <!-- Not a kyūjitai character. Both 付 and 附 are listed as separate characters in jōyō kanji 2010 -->

# {{l|en|attach}}, {{l|en|enclose}}, {{l|en|append}}

subSections.title: Compounds
Usage notes
subSections.text: 附 is an alternative form of [[付]] which carries the meaning of {{l|en|enclosed}}/{{l|en|attached}}. Note that [[付]] is more commonly used compared to 附.
